Package ru.clevertec.auth.security

Class JwtTokenProvider

java.lang.Object
ru.clevertec.auth.security.JwtTokenProvider
@Service public class JwtTokenProvider extends Object
Service class for JWT token management. This class provides methods to create and refresh JWT tokens, as well as validate them.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sergey Leshkevich

    • JwtTokenProvider

      public JwtTokenProvider()

  • Method Details

    • init

      @PostConstruct public void init()
      Initializes the service by setting up the secret key used for signing JWT tokens.

    • createAccessToken

      public String createAccessToken(Long userId, String username, Set<Role> roles)
      Creates an access token for a user with the given ID, username, and roles.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user.
      username - the username of the user.
      roles - the roles of the user.
      Returns:
      a signed JWT access token.

    • createRefreshToken

      public String createRefreshToken(Long userId, String username)
      Creates a refresh token for a user with the given ID and username.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user.
      username - the username of the user.
      Returns:
      a signed JWT refresh token.

    • refreshUserTokens

      public JwtResponse refreshUserTokens(String refreshToken)
      Refreshes the user's authentication tokens using the provided refresh token.
      Parameters:
      refreshToken - the refresh token to use for generating new tokens.
      Returns:
      a JwtResponse containing new access and refresh tokens.

    • getJwtResponse

      public JwtResponse getJwtResponse(String token)
      Retrieves a JwtResponse containing the user's details and tokens based on the provided JWT token.
      Parameters:
      token - the JWT token to parse.
      Returns:
      a JwtResponse with user details and tokens.

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid(String token)
      Validates the provided JWT token.
      Parameters:
      token - the JWT token to validate.
      Returns:
      true if the token is valid, false otherwise.

    • getAuthentication

      public org.springframework.security.core.Authentication getAuthentication(String token)
      Retrieves the authentication object for the user identified by the JWT token.
      Parameters:
      token - the JWT token to parse.
      Returns:
      an Authentication object containing the user's details and authorities.
